reviewText: This show is cute, but my daughter finds it too slow and too simple concepts. She never wants to watch it. I think it may be better for someone younger. For some kids, I suppose it would make good bedtime wind-down viewing.

reviewText: Oh my goodness! A super 4 dvd set! My son LOVES all of the Kipper movies. Having the 4 all together like this is great especially when we go for a car ride. I only need to bring the 1 box!!

reviewText: My son loves Kipper. The episodes are cute and age appropriate. I dont have to worry about him watching anything he shouldnt be and the colors catch his attention.
Title: N/A

reviewText: where would we be without our kipper. Our 2 year old LOVES the shows and the characters, They are his friends and he talks about them when he is playing with other toys. My husband and I love the show far more than any of our other favorites. They don't get annoying after repeated viewing, really. The animation and the jazz background music are calm. The dialogue is perfect--not too much, not too little, The characters are endearing. No heavy, overbearing lessons. The goodness and fullness of the characters do all a child's story should. Martin Clunes is the voice of Kipper--a real actor!.  I want to give this 10 stars!
